title: SITMOD Gaming Chairs for Adults with Footrest-Computer Ergonomic Video Game Chair-Backrest and Seat Height Adjustable Swivel Task Chair with Lumbar Support(Gray)-Fabric
descriptions:
Meet the SITMOD Comfort Chair with Footrest (Gray) — a cozy, supportive chair for home, work, or relaxing.

Easy comfort:
- Soft, thick seat cushion and padded armrests for all‑day sitting.
- High back with adjustable lumbar pillow and head pillow to support your back and neck.
- Pull‑out footrest to put up your feet and rest.

Simple to adjust:
- Seat height goes up and down about 3 inches to fit your desk.
- Back reclines from straight (90°) to a gentle lay‑back (150°) for reading, TV, or a nap.
- The chair turns in a full circle (360°) so you can reach things without twisting.

Built to feel sturdy:
- Strong steel frame and heavy‑duty base.
- Smooth rolling wheels.
- Supports up to 300 pounds.
- Safety‑tested gas lift (SGS certified).

Right size:
- Seat: about 20.5 inches wide, 20.8 inches deep.
- Backrest: about 22 inches wide, 32.6 inches tall.
- Overall height adjusts from about 49 to 52 inches.

Good for:
- Computer use, reading, TV, phone calls, puzzles, or simply putting your feet up.

Easy help and returns:
- “No questions asked” return policy.
- Free parts replacement if something breaks.
- Friendly support if you need assistance.

Notes:
- Some assembly is needed. If you prefer, ask a friend or family member to help. Most people finish in about 20–30 minutes with the included tools.
- Color: Gray. Material: soft, breathable fabric that’s gentle on the skin.

If you want a chair that is soft, supportive, and easy to adjust, this SITMOD chair makes sitting comfortable and simple every day.
